synopsis.text:
Kuma, a young bear, embarks on a new day filled with endless possibilities within the comfort of his room. From experimenting with various liquids to nurture a plant, to creating melodies on his guitar, and engaging in a playful baseball session, Kuma's day is brimming with joy and curiosity.

Produced by dwarf and NHK, this vibrant stop-motion animation is a delightful children's music video that explores the world of Kuma. Composed and performed by Utada Hikaru, the video showcases Kuma's adventures, his abilities, and his limitations, while highlighting what sets him apart from objects like cars and chocolates. Amidst all his fun, Kuma's friendly rivalry with a fried shrimp adds an extra layer of excitement to his day.

This colorful and engaging music video not only captures the playful essence of a clumsy bear but also sheds light on his unique personality, likes, and dislikes.
